story: Mohammad Fouad shared Cloud Weekend's event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Cloud Weekend 2015
caption: Cloud Weekend 2015
description:
Egypt's Biggest Cloud Computing and Big Data summit

Cloud Weekend 2015 is the 3rd iteration of the Cloud Weekend series launched in 2012. This year we will focus on the emerging trends in Cloud Computing and Big Data  inspired by the latest advances concerning the infrastructure, operations, analytics and available services throughout the global network.

Cloud Weekend 2015: We Talk Cloud! 

Cloud Weekend 2015 brings together a strong array of the CIOs and CTOs of the top Cloud Computing and Big Data players in addition to architects, senior engineers, IT leaders across the board starting with business, to academia and governmental bodies. 

Speakers at Cloud Weekend 2015 are regional and international industry thought leaders from Telecom Egypt (TE), Dell, EMC2, IBM, Microsoft, Oracle, SAP,Vodafone, TeraData, Cloud11, and Google.

Cloud Weekend 2015 Structure: 

-- Keynotes: Top Notch Speakers from all around the world covering the most advanced technologies from the world

-- Panel Discussions: Top leaders in each track will be discussing a hot topic in each category, sharing their opinions and vision.

-- Sessions: Through 30 minute session, our speakers will cover the latest technologies and introduce their products

--Workshops: Parallel workshops will be introduced to implement the different technologies and get hands-on the different products.

-- Exhibition: Summit sponsors will have a space to have their representatives communicating with our audience.
 
Why should you attend?

The Conference will not only impart valuable knowledge, it will also help you inspire and connect with peers, customers, partners, prospective vendors and colleagues from global multi-national organizations in more profitable and refreshing way. When you attend CW15 you will:

- Become a recognized face/name in Cloud space.

- Develop and share ideas, innovation and knowledge on Cloud Computing and Big Data best practices.

- Meet like-minded cloud professionals and make new business connections. 

- Meet new companies and people in the cloud space and build mutually-beneficial business relationships.

What’s New this Year?

To ensure that we grow with and adjust to changing industry needs and priorities, we have made some notable changes while simultaneously moving the brand forward to acknowledge the differing maturity stages, investment levels and adoption phases.

- More keynotes and bellwether speakers from leading international companies.

- World-class panel discussions on the main topics of the conference.

- Cloud Exhibition and on-site workshops for some hands-on experience with latest technologies.

- More networking activities, and group discussions, and way more fun!

How to attend Cloud Weekend 2015?

• Visit http://bit.ly/cloudweekend

• Create an @[249167708461403:274:Eventtus] account or sign up with Facebook then click on "Get ticket" to apply

• Wait for an approval/rejection email with a confirmation code in case of approval

• Buy your ticket from Vodafone stores. Vodafone branches selling our tickets: www.eventtus.com/wheretopay

Follow our social media for speakers and agenda announcements on: twitter @cloudweekend - instagram @cloudweekend 

#CWCairo
We Talk Cloud!
www.cloudweekend.com
